questions.question: Where did the religion associated with the Bagratuni Dynasty come into existence?
questions.system_answer:
The Bagratuni (Bagratid) dynasty was an Armenian noble house, and the faith that defined them was the **Armenian Apostolic Church**.  
This church traces its roots to the very first Christianization of Armenia in the early 4th century. According to tradition, **St. Gregory the Illuminator** converted King Tiridates III, and in **301 CE** Armenia adopted Christianity as its state religion—making it the first nation to do so. Thus, the religion associated with the Bagratuni dynasty came into existence in **Armenia** during the early 4th century.

questions.question: From which continent does the sport of Haverfordwest County A.F.C. originally hail?
questions.system_answer: Haverfordwest County A.F.C. plays association football (soccer), a sport that originated in **Europe** (specifically England).

questions.question: What is the birthplace of the person who founded the religion that Clemens August of Bavaria believed in?
questions.system_answer: The religion Clemens August of Bavaria followed was Catholicism, which traces its origins back to Jesus Christ. According to Christian tradition, Jesus was born in **Bethlehem** (in the region of Judea, now part of the West Bank).
